alert.note: Alert for Duchesne; Wasatch (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 30 at 4:45PM MDT until June 30 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE DOLLAR RIDGE BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WEST CENTRAL DUCHESNE AND SOUTHEASTERN WASATCH COUNTIES... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar rainfall estimated between 0.5 and 0.75 inches of rain fell on upper portions of the burn scar from an earlier thunderstorm. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Excessive rainfall over the burn scar will result in debris flow that will continue to move into and downstream within the Strawberry River reach below Strawberry Reservoir until its terminus at Starvation Reservoir. The debris flow can consist of rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Dollar Ridge Burn Scar. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Dollar Ridge Burn Scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... The Strawberry River reach between Strawberry Reservoir and Starvation Reservoir, including the Promised Land Resort. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: A debris flow is expected to impact the Strawberry River corridor from Strawberry Reservoir to Starvation Reservoir. People living in this area should take action to ensure their safety! Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
